Title: Requires climate change and sustainability education in elementary and high schools
Summary: Requires that climate change and sustainability education be taught in elementary and high schools to educate pupils about how human activities cause climate change, the effects of climate change, the dangers associated with climate change and preventative measures that can be taken to alleviate the impacts of climate change.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to requiring climate change and sustainability education in elementary and high schools
